tietosuojaseloste__asiointipalvelunsa_to: to ensure and improve the functionality of its e-services
tietosuojaseloste__ei_oikeutta_tapahtuma: No right to correct event logs.
tietosuojaseloste__henkilokortti_sahkoin: ID card: e-Services code, information on the party providing the certificate
tietosuojaseloste__henkilorekisterin_tie: No automatic decision-making or profiling is performed on the basis of data from the personal data file.
tietosuojaseloste__henkilotietoja_ei_luo: Personal data may not be transferred to areas outside the EU or EEA.
tietosuojaseloste__henkilotietojen_kasit: Processing of personal data is not based on consent.
tietosuojaseloste__yleisen_tietosuojaase: Informing the data subject in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679
tietosuojaseloste__henkilotunnus_jos: personal identity code, if they have used internet bank codes, a mobile certificate or certificate card in identification
tietosuojaseloste__jos_kayttajalle_on_me: If an order of non-disclosure for personal security reasons is valid for the user in the Population Information System, the Suomi.fi identification will not process data to which the non-disclosure applies.
tietosuojaseloste__katso_id_jos: Katso ID, if the user has used Katso for identification
tietosuojaseloste__kayttajan_lomakkeelle: Information that the user has entered on the form can include:
tietosuojaseloste__lisaksi_rekisterinpit: The controller may also disclose data on the service to:
tietosuojaseloste__lisaksi_tietoja_voida: Information may also be disclosed for other purposes laid down in the law. Such situations include the disclosure of information to the police, criminal investigation authorities and the prosecuting authorities.
tietosuojaseloste__lomakkeen_lahettamise: Time and date stamps related to the submission of the form
tietosuojaseloste__mikali_tunnistautumin: If identification is interrupted or is unsuccessful with a token, information on the reason for this rejection or failure is saved.
tietosuojaseloste__mobiilivarmenteet_puh: mobile certificates: telephone number, event ID sent to mobile phone
tietosuojaseloste__organisaatiokortit_se: organisation cards as well as other social and healthcare personnel certificate cards: an individual's unique identifier, the certificate's serial number, information on the authority that granted the certificate

tietosuojaseloste__otsikko_yhteyshenkilo: 3. Contact person for matters concerning the register
tietosuojaseloste__palautteen_antajan_ip: IP address for party providing feedback
tietosuojaseloste__palautteen_tai_virhei: content of feedback or error report
tietosuojaseloste__palvelu_johon_on_tunn: the service for which the user identified
tietosuojaseloste__pankkitunnisteet_henk: internet bank codes: personal identity code, name information, bank transaction ID
tietosuojaseloste__poliisi_esitutkinta__: police, pre-trial investigation and prosecuting authorities as well as a court of law for the purposes of preventing and investigating a crime
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteri_ei_sisalla_: The register does not contain manual materials. Manual materials which may be created in liquidations are protected taking into account data security in locked facilities where access is monitored.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteri_on_suomifi_: The register is the Suomi.fi identification event log. The Digital and Population Data Services Agency produces Suomi.fi identification in accordance with section 4 of the Act on central government’s joint e-service support services (571/2016).
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteriin_tallennet: The data saved in the register is used for the follow-up and monitoring of Suomi.fi identification use, fault investigation and investigation of any abuses and data security violations. The event log data saved in the file is also used for statistical purposes, as well as for usage analysis and development of the service.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterin_tietojen_k: The data in the register can only be accessed by persons whose duties include processing such data. Log data is saved on the processing of data.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterin_tietolahte: The data sources of the file are:
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_sail: The controller shall retain the register's data for a period of five years from the beginning of the year following identification  (section 13 of the Act on central government’s joint e-service support services)
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_vaes: Digital and Population Data Services Agency
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_voi_: The controller can also disclose the register's data at request to Suomi.fi identification users, if the information applies to their own event logs.

The controller may disclose information from the register to organisations that utilise Suomi.fi identification in their e-services, if the information has been saved during the use of these e-services or other services and if the organisation needs information:
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteroidylla_ei_ol: The data subject does not have the right to request the deletion of their data, as data processing is based on law. For this reason, the data subject shall not have the right to object to the processing of their personal data or the right to have their data transferred to another system. The data subject does not have the right to request that processing of their personal data be limited.
tietosuojaseloste__rekisteroidylla_on_oi: The data subject has the right to request that the controller allow them access to personal data that applies to them i.e. to check on information that is saved on them in the personal data file. In addition, every person has the right to check that there is no information on them in the register. A request for checking must be submitted in writing to the Digital and Population Data Services Agency's registry (see section 2 for contact information).
The data subject shall have the right to lodge a complaint to the supervisory authority on the processing of personal data.
tietosuojaseloste__seka_saatavilla_vaest: or the Digital and Population Data Services Agency's registry.
tietosuojaseloste__selaimen_ja_kayttojar: Information on browser and operating system
tietosuojaseloste__sosiaali__ja_terveyde: ID card for regulated social welfare and health care professionals: A person's unique identifier supplied by the National Supervisory Authority for Welfare and Health, a certificate's serial number, information on the authority that granted the certificate
tietosuojaseloste__suomifi_tunnistuksen_: information entered and registered by the user in the electronic Suomi.fi identification form
tietosuojaseloste__suomifi_tunnistus_tek: On the basis of the personal identity code recovered by the token the Suomi.fi identification creates a request in the  Population Information System. Personal data recovered by the Population Information system are not saved to the event log register. Instead, the information content can be viewed later on from the Population Information System's logs. If identification is rejected on the basis of the answer from the Population Information System, the reason for the rejection is saved in the register, which be for example  that the information cannot be found with the given personal identity code or that the person connected to the personal identity code has been  declared dead.
tietosuojaseloste__tapahtumatietorekiste: Information is also saved in the event log register on feedback and error notices submitted by the user with the electronic Suomi.fi identification form. The following information is saved on the use of the feedback form:
Information on the use of Suomi.fi identification is saved in the event log register:
tietosuojaseloste__tieto_kaytetysta_tunn: Information on the tokens in use as well as the personal data recovered by the tokens, which include:
tietosuojaseloste__tieto_tunnistusta_pyy: Information on the eService that has requested identification
tietosuojaseloste__tietoaineisto_on_suoj: Data is protected taking into account data security and the management of access rights.
tietosuojaseloste__tietoja_voidaan_luovu: Information may also be disclosed as statistics or in some other format where individuals cannot be identified.
tietosuojaseloste__tietojen_kasittelyn_o: in order to demonstrate that that data is processed in the correct manner or to otherwise examine problems related to the use of e-services
tietosuojaseloste__tietojen_luovutus_suo: The disclosure of information to organisations that utilise Suomi.fi identification and its users is based on section 14 of the Act on central government’s joint e-service support services (571/2016).
tietosuojaseloste__tietosuojavaltuutetul: The Data Protection Ombudsman and the Data Protection Board for the purpose of supervising data security
tietosuojaseloste__tietoturvallisuudesta: to ensure the information security of its e-services or to investigate disturbances in its information security
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistetusta_kayttaj: When a user has been identified, their personal identity code or Katso ID are transferred to the e-service as is information on what other personal data has been transmitted to the e-service from the Population Information System or the Katso identifier. The register does not include any actual information content on transmitted information in addition to the personal identity code or Katso ID.
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistustapahtumaan_: Time stamps related to identification events for Suomi.fi identification and tokens
tietosuojaseloste__tunnistusvalineet_ja_: tokens and their related identification services
tietosuojaseloste__rekisterinpitaja_sail: The personal data contained in the eIDAS forms based on the eIDAS regulation (Regulation (EU) No 910/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23 July 2014 on electronic identification and trust services for electronic transactions in the internal market and repealing Directive 1999/93/EC) and used in Suomi.fi e-Identification is stored for five years, starting from the beginning of the calendar year.
tietosuojaseloste__otsikko_henkilotietoj: The Digital and Population Data Services Agency produces eIDAS form services under Article 6(1)(e) of the General Data Protection Regulation in which it is stated that the processing shall be lawful if it is necessary for the performance of a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the controller.

Under section 5(1) of the Act on Central Government Joint e-service Support Services (571/2016), public administration authorities must use Suomi.fi e-Identification and under Article 6 of the eIDAS regulation, public sector bodies must recognise the identification issued in another Member State. The Digital and Population Data Services Agency provides the eIDAS form service as part of Suomi.fi e-Identification so that it can offer eIDAS identification to organisations using Suomi.fi e-Identification.
tietosuojaseloste__otsikko_rekisterin_ti: No information identifying the persons using the eIDAS form is entered into the event log file. The following technical data on the use of the eIDAS service request form is recorded:
The person requesting identification has been referred to the form
attempts have been made to send the form
tietosuojaseloste__otsikko_saannonmukais: for eIDAS-identified persons personal data provided by other member country, information entered by the user and the eService utilizing Suomi.fi identification
